articles.content: Microsoft makes software and hardware, and recently, the company has arguably become equally skilled at both. But Microsoft’s software still shines brightest, especially in gaming. Inconsistent sales… [+8749 chars]

articles.title: The Mavic Air 2 Is Definitely the Drone I Was Looking For - Gizmodo
